inclusion.criterion: chronic liver disease patients including non-alcoholic fatty liver disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patients, chronic liver hepatitis patients without cirrhosis, compensated cirrhosis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: having acute liver injury [ALT(alanine aminotransferase)>3NL(normal level),AST(aspartate aminotransferase)>3NL or TB(total bilirubin)>2NL within 1 week - before enrollment] or acute decompensation[having ascites, hepatic encephalopathy, bacterial infection ,gastrointestinal bleeding or jaundice(TB>5NL)within 1 month]
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: inpatient (hospitalization >1 days)(including patient in emergency observation wards)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: hepatocellular carcinoma or other liver malignancies
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has chronic liver disease, including non-alcoholic fatty liver disease and decompensated cirrhosis. They have had recent hospitalization for UGIB and are being treated for hepatic encephalopathy.
